text: Tomara yadi satkaja kara tabe tomadera nijedera jan'ye'i satkaja karacho, ara yadi tomara manda kara tabe ta'o nijedera jan'ye. Sutaram yakhana parabarti oyadara samaya ela takhana yena tara tomadera mukhamandala kalimacchanna karate pare, ara yena tara masajide dhukate pare yemana ora prathamabara ete dhukechila, ara yena tara purna bidhbanse dhbansa karate pare ya-kichu tara dakhala kare.
